name: Three Roots
description:
This is a twin-stick shooter match 3 arcade game! Shoot enemies to root them to the spot, a group of 3 or more rooted enemies of the same colour will dissapear adding to your score.

The more enemies in the group the higher your score! And if any of them happen to be on a tile of the same colour as the enemy group you'll get an even bigger score!

Try to get the highest score you possibly can!

ControlsKeyboardController*Root (Fire)
SpaceRight Bumper (R1)AimArrow KeysRight analogue stickMoveWASDLeft analogue stickPauseEscape / PStart / SelectSlow move (hold)
Left ShiftLeft Bumper (L1)

*Controller tested with PS4 controller. Cannot guarantee XBox controllers working.

Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rooted-1
